Interface MBeanInterceptorWrapper.Controller

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MBeanServerInterceptorWrapper.Controller
    Enclosing class:
    MBeanInterceptorWrapper
    Deprecated. 
    Use MBeanServerInterceptorWrapper.Controller instead.

    public static interface MBeanInterceptorWrapper.Controller
extends MBeanServerInterceptorWrapper.Controller
    This interface is called before and after each operation is invoked on the wrapped interceptor.
